member.summary: Create a base key for a response cache entry.

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNetCore.ResponseCaching.Internal.IResponseCachingKeyProvider.CreateStorageVaryByKey(Microsoft.AspNetCore.ResponseCaching.Internal.ResponseCachingContext)
member.summary: Create a vary key for storing cached responses.

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNetCore.ResponseCaching.Internal.IResponseCachingKeyProvider.CreateLookupVaryByKeys(Microsoft.AspNetCore.ResponseCaching.Internal.ResponseCachingContext)
member.summary: Create one or more vary keys for looking up cached responses.
member.returns: An ordered containing the vary keys to try when looking up items.

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNetCore.ResponseCaching.Internal.IResponseCachingPolicyProvider.AttemptResponseCaching(Microsoft.AspNetCore.ResponseCaching.Internal.ResponseCachingContext)
member.summary: Determine whether the response caching logic should be attempted for the incoming HTTP request.
member.returns: true if response caching logic should be attempted; otherwise false.

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNetCore.ResponseCaching.Internal.IResponseCachingPolicyProvider.AllowCacheLookup(Microsoft.AspNetCore.ResponseCaching.Internal.ResponseCachingContext)
member.summary: Determine whether a cache lookup is allowed for the incoming HTTP request.
member.returns: true if cache lookup for this request is allowed; otherwise false.

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNetCore.ResponseCaching.Internal.IResponseCachingPolicyProvider.AllowCacheStorage(Microsoft.AspNetCore.ResponseCaching.Internal.ResponseCachingContext)
member.summary: Determine whether storage of the response is allowed for the incoming HTTP request.
member.returns: true if storage of the response for this request is allowed; otherwise false.

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNetCore.ResponseCaching.Internal.IResponseCachingPolicyProvider.IsResponseCacheable(Microsoft.AspNetCore.ResponseCaching.Internal.ResponseCachingContext)
member.summary: Determine whether the response received by the middleware can be cached for future requests.
member.returns: true if the response is cacheable; otherwise false.

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNetCore.ResponseCaching.Internal.IResponseCachingPolicyProvider.IsCachedEntryFresh(Microsoft.AspNetCore.ResponseCaching.Internal.ResponseCachingContext)
member.summary: Determine whether the response retrieved from the response cache is fresh and can be served.
member.returns: true if the cached entry is fresh; otherwise false.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNetCore.ResponseCaching.Internal.StreamUtilities.BodySegmentSize
member.summary: The segment size for buffering the response body in bytes. The default is set to 80 KB (81920 Bytes) to avoid allocations on the LOH.

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNetCore.ResponseCaching.ResponseCachingMiddleware.OnFinalizeCacheHeaders(Microsoft.AspNetCore.ResponseCaching.Internal.ResponseCachingContext)
member.summary: Finalize cache headers.
member.returns: true if a vary by entry needs to be stored in the cache; otherwise false.

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNetCore.ResponseCaching.ResponseCachingMiddleware.OnStartResponse(Microsoft.AspNetCore.ResponseCaching.Internal.ResponseCachingContext)
member.summary: Mark the response as started and set the response time if no reponse was started yet.
member.returns: true if the response was not started before this call; otherwise false.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNetCore.ResponseCaching.ResponseCachingOptions.SizeLimit
member.summary: The size limit for the response cache middleware in bytes. The default is set to 100 MB.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNetCore.ResponseCaching.ResponseCachingOptions.MaximumBodySize
member.summary: The largest cacheable size for the response body in bytes. The default is set to 64 MB.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNetCore.ResponseCaching.ResponseCachingOptions.UseCaseSensitivePaths
member.summary: true if request paths are case-sensitive; otherwise false. The default is to treat paths as case-insensitive.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNetCore.ResponseCaching.ResponseCachingOptions.SystemClock
member.summary: For testing purposes only.
